title: PAIRFORMANCE Premium Soccer Uniforms for Kids, Sizes 6-12, Boys and Girls Sports Activewear Color Shirts and Shorts
features: ULTIMATE COMFORT - Moisture-wicking technology. Experience freshness and comfort with our soccer uniform's breathable fabric that allows for unrestricted movement during any activity. Our youth soccer uniform is made for keeping your child cool and comfortable on the field. The elastic waistband on the shorts ensures a snug and comfortable fit, while the jersey is designed with a loose fit for ease of movement and flexibility.

SIZES AND QUALITY - Size Small, for 7 to 8 years old // Size Medium for 9 to 11 years old // Size Large for 12 -13 years old. Our soccer uniform is made from high-quality materials that ensure durability and longevity, breathable performance fabric, so you can enjoy your uniform for seasons to come.This soccer uniform set is machine washable, making it easy to clean and maintain even after a tough game or practice.

DRESS THE WHOLE TEAM - Our fabric is designed and perfect for adding heat-transfer names and numbers, give the gift of sportsmanship.Outfit your favorite neighborhood or league team with stylish new uniforms. Our brand logo is right in the shirt while the kids perform their best. Great soccer gift for kids. And, the fabric is perfect for adding heat-transfer names and numbers. As rewards for a good team, make them a custom uniform.

STYLISH DESIGN - Stand out from the crowd with our soccer uniform's bold colors. This soccer uniform set includes a short-sleeve jersey and shorts, both designed with a stylish and sporty look that kids will love.These sets for boys and girls can also work as a costume.

MATCHING COLORS JERSEY AND SHORTS- Because each kid has their unique style, we offer you five nice bright colors with color printed shirts and matching shorts. Get matching soccer gear and your kid will be styling while they play. It is just perfect kids clothes for everyday! Two pcs childrens will use ever after.
description: At PAIRFORMANCE, we encourage team sports. Kids make the best memories and lasting friendships when they’re part of a team that’s all working toward a goal – whether it’s to win the next game or the big championship title for the big trophy! Help make that dream come true for the next generation! Whether you coach a team of kids, you’re the parent of a kid who loves to play soccer with the neighborhood kids or you’re a business owner trying to make a difference in your community, know that when you outfit the team in snazzy new uniforms, it will boost their team spirit and those field goals will be flying! And, when all eyes are on that one kid who needs to make the free throw, he or she will rise taller and kick that ball right into the goal! Be the one who supports and encourages that kid and all the others on the team! In eye-catching color combinations, the team will look sharp and play like they are the champions league. Be the one to encourage that dream in a kid’s mind! Or support the coach who knows the valuable life’s lessons to be learned playing team sports. Buy PAIRFORMANCE soccer uniforms to promote your favorite kids team today! PAIRFORMANCE products fit to succeed. We are a brand that keeps creating and offering quality and fun apparel for all ages and styles. Our Premium Soccer Uniform for Kids is conceived to gear your kids while play with style and comfort. Feel the quality while wearing it. Simply perfect with the right fit.
